page.title: 09ORMSKIRK LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: There are many opportunities for enjoyment in the area. For the energetic there are numerous sporting clubs. Park Pool has two swimming pools squash courts and a sauna. Near by Coronation Park has three tennis courts and a putting green and children love the adventure playground, sand pit and the ducks on the pond. There are many inss restaurants and wine bars for those who prefer to take it easy and the two snooker halls are very popular. The large variety of shops, the indoor market, the interesting buildings and the beautiful flower beds make the town an interesting place. The country side is never far away and there are many pleasant walks around our famous farmland.
